# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/qs`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for qs (https://github.com/hapijs/qs).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/qs

 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: qs
